name: Vienna Automobile Society
description: Arcade racing with strategy and reflexes. Control your car's driving line and gears to master the track and outmaneuver other drivers. Simple controls and abstract design recreate the high speed drama of circuit racing.
minimum_requirements: Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Controller recommended.
